title: QR Code Verification System
description: Mobile/tablet app to scan card QR codes and instantly verify bingo wins. Requirements: <2 second verification time, green/red visual feedback, works offline (pre-loaded active cards), manual backup code entry, displays winning card number. Host can pause game to scan multiple cards.

title: Create PWA manifest and setup installability
description: Create manifest.json for PWA installability. Configure: app name, icons, theme colors, display mode (standalone), orientation (portrait). Add meta tags to HTML for iOS support. Enable 'Add to Home Screen' prompt. Test installation on iOS Safari and Chrome Mobile.

title: Deploy verification app to GitHub Pages
description: Deploy PWA to GitHub Pages for HTTPS access (required for camera API). Setup: Create gh-pages branch, configure custom domain (optional), enable HTTPS. Update API URL configuration for production. Document deployment process in README.

title: End-to-end verification app testing
description: Test complete workflow: Generate cards → Load into API → Activate game → Record played songs → Scan winning cards (should show green) → Scan non-winning cards (should show red). Verify <2 second performance. Test on multiple devices (iOS, Android). Test in bar lighting conditions.

title: Unit tests for QR parser and API client services
description: Create Jest unit tests for qrParser.js (parseQRData, validateChecksum) and apiClient.js (verifyCard, healthCheck). Target 95%+ coverage. Test happy paths, error handling, edge cases.

title: Unit tests for useScanner React hook
description: Create Jest tests for useScanner hook using @testing-library/react-hooks. Test state management, handleScan flow, error handling, reset function. Target 90%+ coverage.

title: Unit tests for React components (Scanner, ResultDisplay, ErrorMessage, App)
description: Create Jest + React Testing Library tests for all components. Test rendering, user interactions, conditional display, error states. Target 85%+ coverage.

title: Playwright E2E automated tests with camera/API mocking
description: Set up Playwright, create E2E test suite with mocked camera and API. Test winner/non-winner flows, error handling, mobile viewports (iPhone 12, Pixel 5), accessibility, performance (<2s). Reduces manual testing to ~10min.

title: Manual device testing on real hardware
description: Test on real iPhone and Android devices with actual camera QR scanning. Verify in bar lighting conditions, test vibration feedback. Quick validation (~10min) after automated tests pass.

title: Configure default clip length settings
description: Set how long clips play. Presets: Normal (45s), Quick (30s), Lightning (12s). Defaults: Start at 30s into song. UI: Dropdown or slider for selection. Storage: Save preference per playlist or globally.

title: Extract metadata from audio files
description: Read song info from local files. Data: Title, artist, album, duration. Libraries: music-metadata (Node), mutagen (Python), or similar. Fallback: Use filename if no tags.

title: Implement playlist size validation
description: Enforce minimum playlist requirements. Rules: Min 24 songs (hard limit), Warn if <48 songs, Recommend 48-75 for standard games. UI: Clear error messages with guidance. Block card generation if invalid.

title: Build verification API endpoint
description: REST API endpoint for card verification. Endpoint: GET /api/verify/{game_id}/{card_id}. Input: game_id, card_id from QR scan. Logic: Look up card songs, compare against played songs, check winning pattern. Response: {winner: bool, pattern: string, card_number: int}. Security: Validate checksum before processing.

title: Parse and validate QR code payload
description: Extract data from scanned QR. Expected payload: {card_id, songs[24], game_session_id}. Validate: All required fields present, song IDs match expected format, session ID is active.

title: Build song clip configuration (start point, duration)
description: Configure which part of song to play. Settings: Start time (default 30s), Duration (30-60s normal, 10-15s lightning). Per-song override: DJ can set custom clip points. Preview: Play configured clip before game.

title: Build current song display component
description: Show currently playing song on TV/projector. Display: Song title (large), Artist name, Album art (optional). Requirements: High contrast for bar visibility, auto-updates when song changes. Fullscreen mode.

title: Printed Card Generation System
description: Generate unique 5x5 bingo cards from Spotify playlists. Each card contains 24 songs plus free center space. Every card gets a unique QR code for instant verification. Support PDF export with custom branding (venue logo, DJ contact info). Must generate 50-200 unique cards per game with optimal song distribution (30-40% overlap between cards).

title: Project setup: Choose tech stack and initialize card generation project
Add unit tests: Test card generation algorithm and distribution
Design card data model: Define structures for Card, Song, and QR code data
Implement playlist input handler: Parse and validate playlist (48-75 songs)
Implement card generation algorithm: 5x5 grid with 30-40% overlap distribution
Implement QR code generation: Unique code per card for verification
Implement PDF export: Convert cards to printable PDF format
Add custom branding support: Venue logo and DJ contact info on cards
Create CLI interface: User-friendly command to generate card sets
Add validation: Verify card uniqueness and playlist requirements
Build verification result UI (green check / red X)
description: Display scan results clearly. Win: Large green checkmark, card number, 'WINNER!' text. No win: Red X, 'Not a winner yet' message. Include: Sound effects, animation, easy dismiss. Must be visible in bar lighting.

title: Add pattern selection UI for host
description: Host selects winning pattern for each round. Options: Traditional, Four Corners, X Pattern, Blackout, Frame, Custom. UI: Visual pattern preview, easy switching between rounds.

title: Implement offline mode with pre-loaded cards
description: Work without internet during game. Pre-load: All active card data before game starts. Store: Card IDs, song lists, current game state. Sync: Update when connection available.
close_reason: Not needed - online verification is required

title: Display current winning pattern
description: Show which pattern players need to win. Visual: 5x5 grid with highlighted winning squares. Patterns: Traditional line, Four Corners, X, Blackout, etc. Update when host changes pattern.

title: Build call board showing song history
description: Display list of all songs played in current game. Layout: Grid or list format, most recent highlighted. Requirements: Show song title + artist, scrollable if many songs, clear visual hierarchy.

title: Build QR scanner using device camera
description: Implement camera-based QR code scanning. Requirements: Access device camera, decode QR data, handle scan errors. Tech options: React Native camera, web MediaDevices API, or native iOS/Android. Test on phone/tablet.

title: Fetch playlist tracks from Spotify API
description: Retrieve songs from Spotify playlist. API: Get Playlist Tracks endpoint. Data: Song title, artist, duration, preview URL, album art. Pagination: Handle playlists with 100+ songs.

title: Implement game state management (played songs tracking)
description: Backend service to track game state. Features: Create new game session, record each song as played, store current winning pattern, expose state to verification API. Storage: In-memory for active game + persist to DB. API: POST /api/game/start, POST /api/game/song-played, GET /api/game/{id}/state
close_reason: Implemented game state management with in-memory storage

title: Music Bingo MVP - Launch Ready System
description: Complete working music bingo system: printed cards with QR codes, mobile verification app, game display for venues, and Spotify playlist integration. Target: Professional DJ use at bars and venues.

title: Integrate card generator with API (export/import cards)
description: Bridge card generation and API verification. Add JSON export to card generator (card_id, game_id, card_number, song_positions). Add bulk import endpoint to API: POST /api/game/{game_id}/cards/bulk. Create integration script to generate cards and load into game. This unblocks end-to-end testing: generate → load → scan → verify. Critical path for MVP.
close_reason: Implemented card generator/API integration: JSON export, bulk import endpoint, integration script, 9 new tests passing

title: Add manual code entry as backup verification
description: Fallback when QR scan fails. UI: Text input for card code (printed on card). Validation: Same logic as QR scan. Use case: Damaged QR, camera issues, bright lighting.

title: Support local music file import (MP3, M4A)
description: Load playlists from local files. Formats: MP3, M4A, WAV. Metadata: Extract title, artist from ID3 tags. UI: Folder picker or drag-and-drop. Validation: Check file is playable audio.

title: Track played songs during active game
description: Maintain list of songs played in current game session. Requirements: Add song when played, persist across app restarts, sync with host display system. Storage: Local state + optional cloud sync.
notes: This is backend/game state - move to Game Display or create separate Backend epic

title: Build playlist preview and song list UI
description: Show loaded playlist before game. Display: Song list with title/artist, total song count, estimated game duration. Features: Remove songs, reorder, search/filter.

title: Implement Spotify OAuth authentication
description: Connect to user's Spotify account. Flow: OAuth 2.0 authorization code. Store: Access token, refresh token. Handle: Token expiration, re-authentication. Test with personal Spotify account.

title: Add transition time between songs
description: Configurable gap between songs. Default: 5 seconds. Use: Host announcements, player marking time. UI: Show countdown timer during transition. Config: Adjustable 3-10 seconds.

title: Playlist & Music Management
description: Import playlists from Spotify (OAuth integration). Support local music files (MP3, M4A). Track which songs played during game. Store song metadata. Playlist sizing validation: min 48 songs (quick game), 60 songs (standard), 75 songs (marathon). Configure clip start point (default: 30s into song) and duration.

title: Implement play/pause/skip controls for host
description: Host control panel for music playback. Controls: Play, Pause, Skip to next song, Replay current song. UI: Large touch-friendly buttons, keyboard shortcuts. State: Sync with display.

title: Support multiple winning patterns
description: Validate different bingo patterns. Patterns: Traditional (5 in row/column/diagonal), Four Corners, X Pattern, Blackout, Frame. Config: Host selects pattern before game. Validation must check correct pattern.

title: Implement song queue and playback from playlist
description: Play songs from loaded playlist. Features: Shuffle order, play clips (not full songs), track played vs remaining, fade in/out between songs. Integration: Spotify SDK or local files.

title: Implement winner validation logic
description: Check if scanned card is a winner. Logic: Compare card's marked songs against played songs list. Check if marked songs form winning pattern (row, column, diagonal, etc.). Return: win/no-win status with details.

title: Game Display & Control System
description: TV/projector output for venues showing current song playing, call board (song history), and active game pattern. Host controls: play/pause, skip song, replay last song, pattern selection. Song clips: 30-60s normal, 10-15s lightning rounds. Configurable transition time between songs (default 5s). Clean, venue-appropriate UI.

title: Add '5 in a row' pattern (any row, column, or diagonal wins)
description: Implement classic bingo '5 in a row' pattern where any row, column, or diagonal counts as a win. This pattern checks all three winning conditions (row OR column OR diagonal) and returns true if any match. Update backend API pattern types, game service logic, and add tests. This is the most common bingo pattern for bars/venues.
close_reason: Implemented FIVE_IN_A_ROW pattern - classic bingo mode with any row, column, or diagonal winning
